Contact Admin Page

This page can be used to send emails to the HvZ admins.
How do I send an Email to the admins?
1. Type the subject of your email into the Subject text box.
2. Type the body of your email into the Body text box.
3. Enter your name in the Name text box, or use the default value.
4. Enter your Email in the Email Address text box, or use the default value.
5. Tap the Send button to send the Email to an admin.

Troubleshooting

I receive the message: "Unable to send email"
Possible Cause:
Network connectivity issues
1. Open a web browser on your mobile device.
2. Open a new tab on the web browser.
3. Attempt to access a webpage (e.g. www.google.com).
4. If you cannot access a webpage on the internet, try again at a later time when you have internet connectivity.
5. If you can access a webpage on the internet, restart the HvZ application on your mobile device and try again.

Mission Listings

The mission listings page displays all missions currently related to this season\'s match. The missions list is made up of three sublists.

Active missions are missions that are still in progress and can be completed by a player at this time.

Issued missions are missions that cannot be completed at this time but will be active in the near future.

Closed missions are missions that are no longer active and and cannot be completed at this time.

How do I view mission details?
1. Scroll through the missions list and locate a mission you wish to view in detail.
2. Tap on the mission to be taken to a page that shows the selected mission\'s details.

Kill Map

The kill map page is used to view the locations on campus of the most recent kills this season.

Kill Board

The kill board displays the current state of the game by showing lists of which player is in which faction. It is divided into Human and Zombie lists, with each entry containing detailed information about a player.

Achievements

The achievement page lists all possible achievements you can earn in HvZ. You can scroll through a list of achievements you have earned (Unlocked), or a list of achievements you have yet to earn (Locked).

User Profile

This page is your player profile page. It displays your avatar and slogan, as well as your stats for the current game.

Troubleshooting

The profile on my phone does not match the one on the HvZ game website.
Possible Cause:
The profile loaded on your phone needs to be refreshed.
At this time, you will need to logout and log back in to the application to refresh your profile.
1. Press the Android menu button.
2. Tap the Logout option on the menu that appears.
3. Login to the app using your GT credentials.
4. Return to the profile page to view your updated statistics.

Kill Reporting

Players can use this page to report their kills. Your victim\'s player code can be keyed in manually, or can be scanned via QR code. Two fellow zombies to feed with their kills as well.

How do I report a kill?
1. Prompt your victim for his or her player code.
2. Enter the code into Player Code text field manually, or scan their QR code with Scan QR Code button.
3. If applicable, specify the zombies you would like to feed using the Feed1 and Feed2 text fields.
4. Press the Set Kill Location button and touch the Ga Tech map where the kill took place.
5. Press the Report Kill button to finish reporting your kill.
How do I specify which zombies to feed?
1. Tap the text field to the right of the Feed1 label. A list of players should appear.
2. Scroll through the list to find the player you wish to feed.
3. Tap the player to be taken back to the Report Kill screen, and the Feed1 field will be populated. 4. Repeat steps 1-3 for the Feed2 field.

Troubleshooting

I receive the message: "Zombie came back null"
Possible Cause:
One or more players you are trying to feed have not been properly inserted into the HvZ database.
1. Contact an HvZ admin.
2. Tell the admin about this message and which player(s) you tried to feed.

I receive the message: "Error fetching Zombie names."
Possible Cause:
You have lost connection to the internet since you logged in.
1. Open a web browser on your mobile device.
2. Open a new tab on the web browser.
3. Attempt to access a webpage (e.g. www.google.com).
4. If you cannot access a webpage on the internet, try again at a later time when you have internet connectivity.
5. If you can access a webpage on the internet, restart the HvZ application on your mobile device and try again.

HvZ Chat

The HvZ chat room allows HvZ players to plan, coordinate, and relay information to one another. The chat room is global and anyone signed up for Humans Vs. Zombies this semester can view your messages.
How do I post a message in the chat room?
1. Type your message into the textbox at the bottom of the screen.
2. Press the Post button to post your message.

Troubleshooting

I receive the message: "There was an Error fetching the chats"
Possible Causes:
Network connectivity issues
1. Open a web browser on your mobile device.
2. Open a new tab on the web browser.
3. Attempt to access a webpage (e.g. www.google.com).
4. If you cannot access a webpage on the internet, try again at a later time when you have internet connectivity.
5. If you can access a webpage on the internet, restart the HvZ application on your mobile device and try again.

Chat rooms disabled by HvZ admins
1. Attempt to join the chat room hosted on the HvZ website here.
2. If chat room is available, attempt to post a message using a the web interface.
3. If a message cannot be posted, consult an HvZ admin about chat room restrictions.
4. If a message can be posted, restart the HvZ application on your mobile device and try again.

Chat servers are offline
1. Attempt to join the chat room hosted on the HvZ website at here.
2. If chat room is unavailable, consult an HvZ admin regarding the status of the chat room.

Login Screen

HvZ players can use this screen to access their HvZ account and view game information. In order to log in, please ensure that you have registered for HvZ this semester at http://hvz.gatech.edu.

How do I login to my account?

2. Type your GT password into the Password field.
